title: Online Shopping Intention Analysis with Python
description: In this article, I’m going to introduce you to a data science project on online shopping intention analysis with Python. The growing popularity of online shopping has led to the emergence of new economic activities. To be successful in a highly competitive eCommerce environment, it is essential to understand customers’ online purchase intent.
